name: Eggpunk Escape
description:
In Eggpunk Escape, a puzzle-platformer game, there’s generally one issue:

You can’t see what’s ahead.

It’s up to you, a small egg yourself, to use stolen eggs to throw and complete your path, solves puzzles and getaway through the steampunk, ‘modern’ city.

Eggpunk Escape is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where the player must use eggs in order to reveal hidden platforms to progress to the next part of the stage

Our inspiration for the game's overall theme
Our game was inspired by the early 1900s painting predictions on how technology would be used in the 2000s. Our art inspiriation also takes themes and ideas from the SteamPunk genre and when coming up with the music we used Cuphead as inspiration.

This game was created in a University 1 Week Game Jam
